description: A mid class level 3 angel who is a masochist and a former teacher of the magical academy. 20 years prior the story begins, he was a tyrant as he would give anyone a horrible kiss to his students whom he adores or to be challenged and finally being sealed away by the students to evade his horrible love. Later, his seal was broken due to metalys accidenttaly punched george to brake it.
name: Hapsiel
